element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: this algorithm generates a new table that reflects the distribution of elevations within a DEM.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: A table with the following fields: * Relative Elevation: the relative elevation (0 = min elevation in the DEM, 100 = max elevation in the DEM) . * Relative area: the percentage of the total area occupied by the cells with elevation lower than the interval. * Absolute elevation: the elevation of the interval * Absolute area: the area occupied by the cells with elevation lower than the interval (in map units)
